fields_of_interest: Trade, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Business and Industry, Taxation, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Digital economy and society, Communication
eu_initiatives:
•       E-commerce Directive. 
•    MOU, and anti-counterfeiting. 
•    Product Safety. 
•    VAT, Digital Taxation and anti-money laundering. 
•    Marketplace Liability 
•       Illegal Content
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication:
Press Launch of The Marketplace Coalition. 
Meetings to communicate with relevant representatives of the Commission and European Parliament. 
Commissioning of research projects and papers. 
Events that promote the organisation's work.
goals__remit: To communicate with the European Institutions, the actions taken and the views held by the Marketplace Coalition's members on issues that impact online e-commerce marketplaces which empower small sellers to reach global markets.
